description: Defines a Flask Blueprint for the health check route, including a class-based view for returning a health status message.

classes.name: HealthCheck
classes.description: A Flask class-based view that handles GET requests for the health check endpoint and returns a JSON message indicating service health.

methods.name: get(self)
methods.description: Handles HTTP GET requests to the root endpoint and returns a JSON object with a 'Healthy' message.

ctags.name: blp
ctags.pattern: /^blp = Blueprint("Healt Check", "health check", url_prefix="\/", description="Health check route"/

fields.name: blp = Blueprint("Healt Check", "health check", url_prefix="\/", description="Health check route"/
